get.description: Retrieve the websites that have the given result type

website.description: The public ID of the website to run the report on. Either website or group is required.

group.description: The public ID of the group to run the report on. Either website or group is required.

users.description: Array of user public IDs to email report to

children.description: An array of child nodes. Shares the same structure as the parent node.

parameters.name: root
parameters.description: If true, endpoint will return the user's root group.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Change the mode of the endpoint. "select" returns a group list while omitting the mode parameter will return the group tree.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The keyword to search by when in "select" mode

blinking_content.name: Blinking content
blinking_content.purpose: Blinking content can be distracting and confusing to users, particularly those with certain cognitive disabilities.
blinking_content.actions: Remove the blinking effect (<blink> element or text-decoration:blink style). Important text can be styled in other ways.
blinking_content.details: A non-empty <blink> element or other text has CSS text-decoration:blink styling.

broken_aria_menu.name: Broken ARIA menu
broken_aria_menu.summary: An ARIA menu does not contain required menu items.
broken_aria_menu.purpose: ARIA menus are application menus (like those used in software menu) with a specific keyboard interactions. They are NOT for navigation links on a web site and must contain at least one menuitem, menuitemcheckbox, or menuitemradio element.
broken_aria_menu.actions: Ensure that the menu is an application menu and has the appropriate keyboard interactions (menu items are navigated via the arrow keys, not via the Tab key) and internal menu items, otherwise remove the menu role.
broken_aria_menu.details: An element with role="menu" does not contain at least one element with role="menuitem", role="menuitemcheckbox", or role="menuitemradio".

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Flag to return only active result types. All result types are included by default, including deprecated result types or original categories.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: Select mode, returns up to 100 results filtered by the search query parameter

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Filter pages by template's Public ID

file.description: CSV file, must have a MIME type of either text/csv or text/plain

requestBody.description: Add either a single page with a JSON object, or multiple pages with CSV.

errors.message: A crawl on this website is already running

get.description: Retrieve the accessibility report attached to a given scan if it exists.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Get pages that have results in a specific category only

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Get pages with a specific result type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by page uri or title

get.description: Get a list of websites with latest scan aggregates sorted by number of errors.
Get information about existing access token

post.description: Get a new Personal Access Token. This will delete all existing tokens.

websites.description: Number of websites that the result was found

count.description: Total number of instances of the result

ReportResultConfiguration.title: ReportResultConfiguration
ReportResultConfiguration.description:
Set results to be included for result detail report. 
Required when report_format is set to "result_detail"

included_results.description: Manually set which results are included. Only required when preset is set to "custom"

evaluation_delay.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after loading the page before evaluation

manual_rate_limit.description: Pages per minute to scan if manual rate limit is used

viewport.description: Viewport width in pixels to use for scans

path.description: The path pattern to either whitelist or blacklist

manual_rate_limit.description: Pages to crawl per minute if manual rate limit used

max_depth.description: The max depth the crawler will go before stopping

max_pages.description: The max amount of pages to crawl before stopping

subdomains.description: Flag to include subdomains. Any subdomains found will be added as new websites automatically.

search.description: Filter selection by title or URI

template.description: Filter by templates. "all", "none", or template's Public ID
